alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 2:54AM MST until January 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, except 1 to 6 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. * WHERE...Inkom, McCammon, Downey, Lava Hot Springs, Malad, Preston, Thatcher, Emigration Summit, Malad Pass, St. Charles, Montpelier, and Georgetown. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusts up to 30 MPH could create blowing snow to impact travel. Where winds are lighter, patchy dense fog will be possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
